languages.text: "Ты прекрасна в своем отречении от человеческого ради совершенства. Ты жаждешь быть идеалом? Так стань же им — со мной".
languages.translation_comment: Если есть два очка на каунтере KibellahTaint

traits.locale_text: [Прошептать на ухо] "Разве хищники повинуются чужим указаниям? Ты жаждешь большего, что было тебе дозволено — так сорви же наконец эти оковы".

languages.translation_comment: Если есть два очка на каунтере KibellahTaint

languages.text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."
languages.original_text: "Ты прекрасна в своем отречении от человеческого ради совершенства. Ты жаждешь быть идеалом? Так стань же им — со мной".

traits.locale_text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."
"You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."
"You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."
"You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."
"You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."
"You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."

languages.text: "Ihr seid wunderschön in Eurer Begierde, Eure Menschlichkeit abzulegen, um Perfektion zu erreichen. Ihr wollt perfekt sein? Dann seid mit mir perfekt."
languages.original_text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid wunderschön in Eurer Begierde, Eure Menschlichkeit abzulegen, um Perfektion zu erreichen. Ihr wollt perfekt sein? Dann seid mit mir perfekt."

languages.text: «Aprecio la belleza en tu deseo de abandonar tu humanidad para perseguir la perfección. ¿Quiere ser perfecta? Sea perfecta conmigo».
languages.original_text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."

traits.locale_text: «Aprecio la belleza en tu deseo de abandonar tu humanidad para perseguir la perfección. ¿Quiere ser perfecta? Sea perfecta conmigo».

languages.text: 「完璧であるために人間性を捨て去りたいと願うお前は美しいな。完璧な存在になりたいと？ならば、共に完璧になろうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."

traits.locale_text: 「完璧であるために人間性を捨て去りたいと願うお前は美しいな。完璧な存在になりたいと？ならば、共に完璧になろうじゃないか」

languages.text: “你渴望抛弃人性、追求完美的样子，确实非常美丽。你想变得完美吗？那就和我一起变得完美吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."

traits.locale_text: “你渴望抛弃人性、追求完美的样子，确实非常美丽。你想变得完美吗？那就和我一起变得完美吧。”

languages.text: « Ce désir que vous avez d'effacer votre humanité au profit de la perfection ne fait que vous rendre d'autant plus belle. Vous voulez être parfaite ? Alors, soyez parfaite avec moi. »
languages.original_text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."

traits.locale_text: « Ce désir que vous avez d'effacer votre humanité au profit de la perfection ne fait que vous rendre d'autant plus belle. Vous voulez être parfaite ? Alors, soyez parfaite avec moi. »

languages.text: "Mükemmellik uğruna insanlığını bir kenara atma arzun sana güzellik katıyor. Mükemmel olmayı mı istiyorsun? O hâlde benimle birlikte mükemmelliğe eriş."
languages.original_text: "You are beautiful in your desire to cast aside your humanity for the sake of perfection. You wish to be perfect? Then be perfect with me."
